Container.Name: Plex Data Collector for InfluxDB
Container.Overview: A speedtest docker container that forwards the data to influxDB. Download the config.ini file from https://github.com/unriad-stuff/Plex-Data-Collector-For-InfluxDB/blob/master/config.ini before you start the container.
Container.Description: Collects data about your Plex server and sends it to InfluxDB Download the config.ini file from https://github.com/unriad-stuff/Plex-Data-Collector-For-InfluxDB/blob/master/config.ini before you start the container.

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: Download the config.ini file from https://github.com/unriad-stuff/Plex-Data-Collector-For-InfluxDB/blob/master/config.ini and copy it to /mnt/user/appdata/plex-collector-influxdb/config.ini COPY THE FILE BEFORE YOU START THE CONTAINER. IF YOU DON'T AN EMPTY DIRECTORY WILL BE CREATED INSTEAD.
